<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">936f6fa67ef7411016d1507f04814e15</macroponent><name>setAdditionalDetails</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params

 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    api.setState("additionalDetails", event.payload.value);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-03 17:29:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>1f6f6fa6e6f74110f74dfb1bdaedbf12</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setAdditionalDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PFM" source="x_708650_pfm">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PFM">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1f6f6fa6e6f74110f74dfb1bdaedbf12</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-03 17:29:28</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
